text:
Whistle Labs, Inc — San Francisco, CA — Full Time

Whistle is the world’s first technology company dedicated to helping pets live longer and healthier lives. Through intuitive devices and a comparative database of pet health information, Whistle is creating a new standard for preventative care and fueling groundbreaking insights to transform veterinary medical research.

We're looking for a Senior iOS Engineer with a strong background building top-notch mobile experiences on iOS. You’ll work with our mobile team on our iOS apps, building fun and intuitive interfaces for our pet-loving customers.

If you're interested in learning more, check out http://www.whistle.com/careers/senior-ios-engineer/
